MainPage.AboutSectionText: - is a non-profit organization whose goal and mission is to restore Ukraine and strengthen its statehood, to contribute to the victory of the Ukrainian people and to provide effective, high-quality and, most importantly, comfortable conditions for every person.
MainPage.AboutSectionText2: of the charitable organization is, first of all, psychosocial support and cultural and educational activities for everyone who feels the need and is interested in it.

MissionPage.Title: Mission and Statute
MissionPage.SubTitle: Fond
MissionPage.SubTitle2: – is about the future. Happy, comfortable and fair.
MissionPage.Text3: — is a dynamic non-profit organisation committed to rebuilding Ukraine and strengthening its statehood.
MissionPage.Text5: to achieve victory and create comfortable conditions for everyone. Our main activities are focused on psychosocial support and cultural and educational work, and are open to everyone who needs it.
MissionPage.Text7: , victims of hostilities and those in need of social adaptation, with a particular focus on students and young people, as we believe that psychological support is crucial for the future of the country.
MissionPage.Text10: , promoting health, self-development and self-realisation through social media and public speaking. The Foundation creates platforms for networking, actively invests in the country's victory by organising fundraisers, donations and volunteering to help the state in all necessary areas.

ContactsPage.Title: Contacts
ContactsPage.PrivacyPolicy: Please read the privacy policy before calling or sending emails! Our public offer agreement and privacy policy are available here:
ContactsPage.Text: To contact us, please call us by phone or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

CoalitionPage.Title: Coalition
CoalitionPage.SubTitle: Coalition
CoalitionPage.Text17: , in which veterans have worthy opportunities for
CoalitionPage.Table: Protection of veterans' and volunteers' rights.
CoalitionPage.Table1: Cooperation with government bodies and international partners.
CoalitionPage.Table2: Support for veteran entrepreneurship and employment.
CoalitionPage.Table3: Rehabilitation and educational programs for veterans.

ForumsPage.Title: Unity Forums
ForumsPage.SubTitle: Unity Forums of Veteran and Volunteer Forces
ForumsPage.Text2: of Unity of Veteran and Volunteer Forces
ForumsPage.Text3: – are large-scale events that bring together veterans, volunteers, representatives of government, business, and public organizations for
ForumsPage.Text5: , which help Ukraine's defenders adapt to civilian life.
ForumsPage.Text6: The greatest achievement – the creation of
ForumsPage.Text7: the Coalition of Veteran and Volunteer Forces.
ForumsPage.Text11: Check the current forum schedule and register for the event on our social media.
ForumsPage.Text13: is a space for real change.
ForumsPage.Text14: Join the initiative and help create new opportunities for those who defended Ukraine.
ForumsPage.Table: Networking – a platform for communication and exchanging experiences among veterans, volunteers, and partners.
ForumsPage.Table1: Discussions with experts and government representatives – answers to important questions regarding social protection, employment, rehabilitation, and education.
ForumsPage.Table2: Support for veteran entrepreneurship – presentation of grant programs, introductions to investors, and opportunities for developing one's own business.
ForumsPage.Table3: Practical training and masterclasses ranging from psychological support to business planning.
ForumsPage.Table4: Job fairs – an opportunity to find a job or learn about career prospects.
